Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board

Class CoordinateTransform

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.CoordinateTransform
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CoordinateTransform extends Object implements Serializable
Class for transforming objects between user coordinate space and board coordinate space.
